description: A Dart class 'FavoritesStore' that manages persistent storage and retrieval of user’s favorite recipe IDs using shared_preferences. It provides methods to get, set, add, and remove favorite recipe IDs, stored as a JSON-encoded list in shared preferences under a specific key.

classes.name: FavoritesStore
classes.description: A helper class providing static methods to handle favorite recipes persistence using shared_preferences.

methods.name: getFavorites
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves the set of favorite recipe IDs from shared preferences, returning an empty set if none are stored or if data is invalid.

methods.name: setFavorites
methods.description: Asynchronously stores the given set of favorite recipe IDs into shared preferences, overwriting previous data.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a recipe ID to the favorites set and updates storage. Returns the updated set.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Asynchronously removes a recipe ID from favorites and updates storage. Returns the updated set.
